name: a memory of this
description:
Today has been a good day, and yet... here you are, feeling like this.  Again.  A short autobiographical game about trying to cope.  Remembering is scary, and reaching our for help can be even scarier, but that does not mean that we have to be all alone.  ** content warning - this game contains mentions of sexual violence and trauma**

･ﾟ✧･ﾟ✧･ﾟ･ﾟ✧･ﾟ✧･ﾟ

This is my  Undergraduate Honours project at Abertay University, I hope you like my game.
